articles.title: Is it really possible to 'bank' sleep for later? - BBC
articles.description: From helping you to focus more to improving sports performance, some scientists believe 'depositing' sleep for later use can bring a range of benefits.
articles.content: One element researchers can't agree on is whether sleep banking can be effective if you're already in debt by being significantly sleep deprived. Rupp and her colleagues argue that it can, but state … [+1568 chars]
